account_registered_as_a_proxy_is_not_all: This account is currently registered as a proxy, and cannot set another proxy without first unregistering as a proxy. To unregister this account, use the Register Voting Proxy tab on the Tools page.
account_that_uses_a_proxy_is_not_allowed: This account currently has set it's votes to another proxy, and cannot itself register as a proxy. To remove the set proxy, click the Change Voter Proxy button on the Producer Voting page.
error_accountName_not_unique_in_contacts: This account name is already in your list of contacts.
error_invalid_referral_code: The referral code you entered is invalid.
error_cannot_transfer_to_self: Invalid recipient, cannot transfer funds to self.
error_eosio_assert_message_exception: 귀하의 {{tokenSymbol}} 블록 체인 요청에 따라 일반 오류가 발생했습니다. 정보가 유효한지 확인하고 다시 시도하세오.
error_invalid_accountName: 인식 불가능한 계정 이름, 1~12 글자로 구성되었는지 확인하세요.
error_invalid_activeKey: 인식 불가능한 Active Key, '{{tokenSymbol}}'로 시작하고 54 자로 구성되어야합니다.
error_invalid_delegatedBw: 인식 불가능한 위임된 대역폭 액수입니다. 예: '12. 121'.
error_invalid_memo: Invalid Memo, must not contain any private keys and must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_ownerKey: 인식 불가능한 Owner Key, '{{tokenSymbol}}'로 시작하고 54 자로 구성되어야합니다.
error_invalid_ramAmount: 인식 불가능한 RAM 금액, 유효 금액은 십진수가없는 정수 여야합니다 예: '1200'.
error_invalid_website: Invalid website, must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_name: Invalid Name value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_logo_256: Invalid Logo url, must begin with 'http://' or 'https://'.
error_invalid_slogan: Invalid Slogan, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_background: Invalid Background value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_philosophy: Invalid Philosophy value, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_length: Entry must be less than 256 characters.
error_invalid_wechat: Invalid Wechat username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_steemit: Invalid Steemit username, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_telegram: Invalid Telegram group, must be less than 256 Bytes.
error_invalid_proposal_send_to: This recipient's account does not exist. You must enter a valid recipient account in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_title: You must enter a valid title (more than 10 characters) for this proposal in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_ipfs_location: You must select a file containing the full details of this proposal in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_content: A valid URL or file containing the full details of this proposal is required in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_category: You must select a category for this proposal in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_description: Please enter a valid description (more than 25 characters) for your proposal in order to continue.
error_invalid_proposal_amount: This is not a valid Amount (must have be a positive amount with a maximum of 4 decimals of precision eg. 12.1212).
error_invalid_proposal_cycles: Each cycle represents 5,000,000 blocks (approx ~29 days). Please enter a valid number of cycles for this proposal.
error_invalid_proposal_milestones: Number of milestones proposal is broken into. Please enter a valid number of milestones for this proposal.
error_invalid_proposal_milestones_amount: The sum of all milestones does not match the total amount requested. Please correct this and try again.
error_no_stake_left: 스테이크 된 금액을 0으로 설정할 수 없습니다. 이렇게하면 네트워크에서 거래를 중단 될 수 있습니다.
error_account_does_not_exist: This account name does not exist.
error_not_enough_delegated_bw_for_new_ac: 일부 대역폭 리소스를 새 계정에 위임해야합니다.
error_not_enough_delegated_cpu_for_new_a: 일부 CPU 리소스를 새 계정에 위임해야합니다.
error_not_valid_stake_amount: 유효한 스테이크 수량이 아닙니다 (최대 소수점 이하 4자리 허용, 예시: 12.1212).
error_ram_has_to_be_over_minimum_amount: 거래 당 최소 3 바이트의 RAM이 필요합니다.
error_ram_not_valid_amount: 인식 불가능한 RAM 용량, 유효 용량은 십진수가없는 정수 여야합니다.
error_ram_under_minimum_for_new_account: 새 계정을 만들려면 최소 4000 바이트의 RAM이 필요합니다.
error_ram_under_minimum_of_2600_for_new_: A minimum of 2600 Bytes of RAM is required to create a new account.
error_ram_usage_exceeded: RAM 사용량이 초과되었습니다. 이 작업을 수행하려면 더 많은 RAM 을 구입하세요.
error_transferring_to_exchange_without_m: Cannot transfer funds to an exchange without passing the memo that was given.
error_producers_form_tfvt_not_exists: This account does not exist. Please make sure you've entered a valid account and try again.
error_producers_form_tfvt_is_nominee: This account is already a nominee and cannot be re-nominated.
error_producers_form_tfvt_is_board: This account is already a member of the Telos Foundation Board.
global_account_import_private_descriptio: 추가 계정을 가져오려면 개인 키를 입력하기 만하면 됩니다. 이 프로그램이 공개 키로 변환하고 관련된 계정을 조회합니다.
global_account_import_private_key: 개인 키 (51 자 와 숫자 5로 시작)
global_account_import_private_requires_h: 이 작업에는 기존의 라이트 지갑이 필요합니다.
가져오기를 수행하기 전에 기존 라이트 지갑으로 전환하여 계속 진행하세요. 관찰지갑 모드에서만 사용 중에 라이트 지갑 기능을 사용하려면, 먼저 재설정하고 라이트 지갑을 가져오세오.
global_account_import_select_accounts: 이 개인 키를 사용하여 가져올 하나 이상의 계정을 선택 하세요.
global_account_import_watch_description: 계정을 관찰지갑으로 가져 오기. 관찰지갑은 계정을 모니터링하고 서명되지 않은 거래를 생성할 수 있습니다.
global_accounts_dropdown_no_accounts: 추가 지갑이 생성되지 않았습니다. 시작하려면 '도구' 로 이동 한 다음 '지갑 관리' 로 이동하세요.
global_button_elevate_failure_header: 입력한 암호가 현재 선택된 지갑의 암호와 일치하지 않습니다.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_1: Sqrl는 사용자가 방문하는 웹 사이트의 안전을 보장하지 않습니다. 키와 계정 정보의 보안에 유의하여 신뢰 가능한 사이트에서만 정보를 공유하십시오.
global_dangerlink_warning_body_3: 계속 진행하시려면 아래의 확인 버튼을 누르십시오..
global_modal_settings_blockchain_descrip: Enter the blockchain network info for any EOSIO chain you would like to interact with.
global_modal_settings_blockchain_form_bl: Enter the name of this blockchain (e.g, {{tokenSymbol}} Mainnet)...
global_modal_settings_blockchain_form_pr: Enter the prefix used for public keys on this blockchain (e.g. {{tokenSymbol}})...
global_modal_settings_blockchain_form_no: Enter the URL of an API node for this blockchain...
global_modal_settings_blockchain_notfoun: We could not connect to this Blockchain with the information provided.
global_modal_settings_blockchain_exists_: A blockchain network with an existing Chain Id already exists.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_descri: 추적할 사용자 지정한 토큰 계약의 계정을 입력하세요.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_header: 추적 할 사용자 지정 토큰 추가
global_modal_settings_customtoken_none_t: 추적할 사용자 지정 토큰 계정이 없습니다.
global_modal_settings_customtoken_notfou: 토큰에 대한 세부 정보를 찾을 수 없습니다.
global_settings_idle_timeout_fifteen_min: Automatically lock wallet after 15 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_five_minute: Automatically lock wallet after 5 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_sixty_minut: Automatically lock wallet after 60 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_idle_timeout_thirty_minu: Automatically lock wallet after 30 minutes of inactivity
global_settings_skip_link_modal_do_not_s: Display warnings when links are clicked
global_settings_skip_link_modal_skip: Never display warnings when links are clicked
global_settings_mirror_cast_vote_on: Always rebalance my voting weight before I vote
global_settings_mirror_cast_vote_off: Never rebalance my voting weight before I vote
global_settings_use_sqrl_token_on: Use my SQRL tokens to pay for CPU/NET resources
global_settings_use_sqrl_token_off: Do not use my SQRL tokens to pay for CPU/NET resources
global_settings_show_resources_on: Show available network resources in wallet
global_settings_show_resources_off: Hide available network resources in wallet
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_do: Do not filter out spam transfers
global_settings_filter_spam_transfers_0_: Filter out transfers with a 0.0001 amount
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.0010
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.0100
Filter out transfers with an amount under 0.1000
global_transaction_actions_details_conte: 이 거래 내의 각 작업은 다음과 같습니다.
global_transaction_complete_warning_mess: 제출된 모든 거래의 승인을 보장할 수는 없습니다. 네트워크 내에서 거래가 완료되었는지 확인하시려면 블록 탐색기에서 위의 거래 ID를 검색하여 최근 비가역 블록에 입력되었는지 확인하십시오.
global_transaction_full_details_content: 이 거래의 전체 데이터는 다음과 같습니다.
global_transaction_message_error_authori: The 'owner' private key is currently imported, which currently can only be used to issue the 'updateauth' command.
The authorizations of this account no longer matches the key currently imported.
The current private key has insufficient permissions to execute the selected action.
The private key can be changed by either removing the currently wallet and reimporting the private key, or by completely resetting the wallet and rerunning the import process.
The private key used in this wallet cannot perform the selected action.
global_transaction_unsigned_message: 서명되지 않은 거래가 관찰지갑에 생성되었습니다. 아래 버튼을 클릭하여 파일로 저장하신 후 콜드지갑에 서명 할 수 있슴니다.
global_transaction_unsigned_warning_mess: 각 거래는 생성 후 1 시간 이내에 서명하고 방송(브로드캐스트) 해야합니다.
invalid_proxy_specified: The proxy account that was specified does not exist. If it is a valid account make sure that it has registered as a proxy voter.
global_transaction_message_error_leeway_: Oops. You do not have enough CPU to perform this transaction.
Before you can perform this transaction, you need to have enough CPU staked on your account. Visit the Wallet tab to update your staked balances (or research the SQRL token - it helps fix this!)
global_transaction_message_error_ramusag: Looks like you don't have enough RAM to complete this operation.
This can quickly be resolved by going to the Wallet tab and purchasing additional RAM for your account. The error details below should provide an indication of how much is needed.
global_transaction_message_error_netusag: Uh oh. The node used to process your transaction is very busy.
Try connecting to a different node because the current one is experiencing high NET usage. You can change the current node via the Tools section and scrolling to the bottom of the page.
global_transaction_message_error_cpuusag: Uh oh. The node used to process your transaction is very busy.
Try connecting to a different node because the current one is experiencing high CPU usage. You can change the current node via the Tools section and scrolling to the bottom of the page.
global_transaction_message_error_deadlin: This transaction took much longer than allowed to execute.
You can try again by changing the node you're currently connected to. The current one rejected this transaction for exceeding the max execution time it's configured to support.
proposal_header_instructions: Submission Fee: Upon submission, a deposit of {{feePercent}}% of the requested proposal amount (minimum {{feeMin}} {{tokenSymbol}}) will be transferred from this account to eosio.saving (Alternatively, simply send the deposit amount directly to eosio.saving). Drafting proposals are free, but please make sure you have a balance of {{feeAmount}} {{tokenSymbol}} before making your proposal live.
proposal_header_instructions_fee: Note: Return of fee is only eligible if minimum threshold of {{minYesRefundThreshold}} YES votes are met or exceeded.
proposal_label_title: What is the title of this proposal?
proposal_step_2_note: Select the file that contains the details of your proposal below. To increase the likelihood of passage, please make sure it provides an executive summary and thorough details along with proper financials.
proposal_step_3_note: Enter the total amount desired along with the number of milestones.
